source.name: geo_ftp
source.description: Download RAW files from the GEO FTP server that match the specified organism.

stage.name: remove_overlapping
stage.arguments: execute_per_file 8 6000 java -Xmx4096m -classpath TROILKATT.CLASSPATH edu.princeton.function.troilkatt.mongodb.SGERawRemoveOverlapping TROILKATT.INPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR TROILKATT.TMP_DIR 10.1.1.1
stage.description: Remove overlapping samples and split RAW file into platform specific parts.

stage.name: cel2pcl
stage.description: Convert cel files to PCL format.

stage.name: missing_values
stage.arguments: execute_per_file 16 4096 java -Xmx2048m -classpath TROILKATT.CLASSPATH edu.princeton.function.troilkatt.mongodb.SGEPclMissingValues TROILKATT.INPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.map 50 3 50 10.1.1.1 > TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.out 2> TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.err
stage.description: Fill in missing values and set some values that are better characterized as missing.

stage.name: knnimpute
stage.arguments: execute_per_file 16 4096 TROILKATT.BIN/KNNImputer -i TROILKATT.INPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE -o TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.knn -k 10 -m 0.7 -d euclidean > TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/KNNImputer.out 2> TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/KNNImputer.error
stage.description: Fill in missing values with their most likely values.

stage.name: map_genes
stage.arguments: execute_per_file 16 4096 java -Xmx2048m -classpath TROILKATT.CLASSPATH edu.princeton.function.troilkatt.tools.PclMapGeneNames TROILKATT.INPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE TROILKATT.GLOBALMETA_DIR/genes/hefalmp/mmu.map TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.map > TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.out 2> TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.err
stage.description: Translate all gene names to a common standard

stage.name: average_duplicates
stage.arguments: execute_per_file 16 4096 java -Xmx2048m -classpath TROILKATT.CLASSPATH edu.princeton.function.troilkatt.tools.PclMeanGenesThatAgree TROILKATT.INPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.avg > TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.out 2> TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.err

stage.name: cleanup_consolidation
stage.arguments: execute_per_file 16 4096 java -Xmx2048m -classpath TROILKATT.CLASSPATH edu.princeton.function.troilkatt.mongodb.SGEPclCleanupConsolidation TROILKATT.INPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE_NOEXT.final.pcl 10.1.1.1 > TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.out 2> TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.err

stage.name: pcl2qdab
stage.arguments: execute_per_file /usr/bin/python TROILKATT.SCRIPTS/pcl2qdab.py TROILKATT.BIN TROILKATT.INPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE TROILKATT.TMP_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE_NOEXT.dat TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE_NOEXT.qdab TROILKATT.GLOBALMETA_DIR/imp/GSE.quant > TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.output 2> TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.error
stage.description: Do distance calculation and convert .dat files to .dab files

sink.name: imp_mouse_raw_pcl_sink
sink.description: There is no sink for the final qdab files.
